price: and prostrate to Him at night, and glorify Him at length by night[7].
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا
footnotes: [7] It refers to the sunset and night prayers.
